title: Abakolagana - Yeekaalu ya Orbital
heading: Abakolagana nabo
intro: Orbital Temple eriwo okuyita mu bugabi, obukugu, n’okwolesebwa kw’abakozi ab’enjawulo. Okuva ku setilayiti za yinginiya okutuuka ku kukola ennyiriri, okuva ku kuggulawo enzigi mu nsi ez’ewala okutuuka ku kusuula ebirooto mu zaabu, buli nkolagana esembereza yeekaalu eno ku mmunyeenye.

riseNy.name: RiseNY&Abakolagana nabo
riseNy.description: Empuliziganya, ebibaddewo ebigattibwa n’ebifaananyi ebiwuniikiriza ebya 3D biraga ebyaleeta okulaba kwa setilayiti mu bulamu nga tennakwata ku bwereere bw’omu bwengula.

highestMantra.name: Mantra Yaffe Esinga Obukulu
highestMantra.description: Nga bakulembeddwamu Sathi Roy, nga bagatta Orbital Temple n’ebitundu bya Buyindi eby’omwoyo n’eby’ekikugu. Okuggulawo amakubo g’okusonda ssente, okuwanyisiganya eby’obuwangwa, n’omwoleso gwa Art Basel oluvannyuma lw’okutongozebwa mu November 2025.

allToSpace.name: Byonna bigenda mu bwengula
allToSpace.description: Abakugu mu Brazil abakola ku setilayiti entonotono. Emyaka ena egy’okukolagana nga tuzimba enkola ya open source hardware platform n’okutandikawo enkola y’okusindika art mu orbit okuva mu Global South.

isro.name: ISRO
isro.description: Ekitongole kya Buyindi ekinoonyereza ku bwengula. Okutongoza omuwa omulimu gwa PSLV ogutwala Orbital Temple okutuuka ku nkulungo ekwatagana n’enjuba mu November 2025.

mercosul.name: Empaka za Mercosur ez’emyaka ebiri ez’omulundi ogwa 13
mercosul.description: Porto Alegre, mu ggwanga lya Brazil. Etegekeddwa Marcello Dantas ng’ali n’abayambi b’abakuumi Laura Cattani, Munir Klamt, Tarsila Riso, ne Carollina Lauriano.

inpe.name: Omusomo gwa INPE / ArtSat
inpe.description: Ttiimu y’okukulaakulanya setilayiti yatondebwawo mu musomo gwa II ArtSat. Ekwasaganyizibwa Fabiane M. Borges, ng’elagirwa Lázaro Camargo, ng’ekolagana ne Ítalo Pinto Rodrigues, ng’erabirirwa Walter Abrahão dos Santos.

solidConcepts.name: Endowooza Ennywevu
solidConcepts.description: Nga bakulembeddwamu Eduardo Dias. Byonna 3D printing ne zaabu micro casting bikola ku sculptural dome, okukyusa ebirooto bya digito mu byuma eby’omuwendo ebituufu.

ideaSpace.name: Ekifo ky'Ekirowoozo
ideaSpace.description: Entandikwa y’ebyenjigiriza mu Brazil ng’ekola ensoma ya Quebrada Space Program, nga yeetegefu okukozesebwa ku bayizi ba siniya okwetoloola Brazil.

imageAlts.highestMantra: Logo yaffe eya Mantra esinga obukulu
imageAlts.mercosul: Akabonero k’emyaka ebiri egya Mercosur egy’omulundi ogwa 13
